condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: COVID19: SUPPORTING ACCESS TO CONTINUOUS CHILD PROTECTION, PSYCHOSOCIAL AND GENDER BASED VIOLENCE SERVICES

description.narrative: UNICEF in Bolivia has contributed to the continuity of child protection services by providing technical assistance and capacity building to frontline workers. This assistance has enabled critical services to adapt their interventions to the current covid19 context in other to provide timely and critical response to child rights violations, with focus on violence against children, while enhancing protection against covid19 | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/08/2020

title.narrative: Number of social service workers trained on specific knowledge and skills to deliver essential services during the COVID-19 pandemic with UNICEF support in the reporting year [COVID]
